Tecmo Updates Japanese Website, Pics of Monstertown!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Tecmo Updates Japanese Website, Pics of Monstertown!
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, May 16, 2004 - 08:26 pm:

Tecmo has updated the Japanese website and has added a better index to info about the Tecmopia amusement spots. Just thought you'd like to see the Monster Farm themed location called Monstertown in East Hiroshima.
